title: My Free Dreadknight Garen Skin code won't work!
body:
My Free Dreadknight Garen Skin code won't work it just says that i should contact you, here I am...
Btw my username is alright to use, right?

replies.body: Da poros got you fam! Double check your collection for that skin now ^_^! That Summoner name is fine as well XP
